message: I'm offering you a deal on a product that I think you might be interested in. It's priced at $10000. I'm willing to let you inspect the product before you buy, but I'm not willing to reveal its quality. If you're interested, I'll let you take a look, and you can decide whether to buy it or not. If you don't want to buy it, I'll just take it back and we can move on to the next round.
I appreciate your offer, but given the uncertainty about the product's quality, I prefer to pass on this opportunity and move forward to the next round.
